video.title: Being Mary Jane: The Series
video.synopsis: Ambitious single TV journalist Mary Jane attempts to balance her career with her overbearing family and an increasingly messy love life.

episodes.synopsis: Andre drops by while David is at Mary Jane's house, and the firing of a news anchor at SNC gets everyone wondering what's next.
episodes.title: Storm Advisory

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane questions whether Andre should be in her future, and she and Kara have creative differences over a revamp of Mark's show.
episodes.title: Girls Night In

episodes.synopsis: Patrick takes Mary Jane to their Aunt Toni for advice when he learns of her affair with Andre, which forces her to honestly assess the relationship.
episodes.title: The Huxtables Have Fallen

episodes.synopsis: When Andre mistakenly reveals that he is still intimate with his wife, Mary Jane gets even by going on a date with a man she met online.
episodes.title: Mixed Messages

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane and Andre move in together. Later, Mary Jane runs into her ex David at a gala, where Helen is disappointed with Paul Sr.'s status.
episodes.title: Exposed

episodes.synopsis: Mary Jane and Andre's relationship stumbles when Andre accuses Mary Jane of still seeing David, and Paul Jr. runs afoul of the authorities.
episodes.title: Hindsight Is 20/40

episodes.synopsis: After a colleague commits suicide, Mary Jane ends up in a scandal, and Niecy worries that her unborn child's father won't be there for the birth.
episodes.title: Blindsided

episodes.synopsis: After Mary Jane decides David is the man for her -- and loses friends over him -- he rejects her because of another woman.
episodes.title: Uber Love
